nnd.title: NND PRO CHILDREN
nnd.description: Complete front-end build to showcase and sell premium kids' supplement products.
nnd.prag1: Kids' supplements often get a bad rap. And for good reason many are packed with artificial ingredients, lack transparency, and fail to meet real nutritional needs.
nnd.prag2: NND is here to change that.
nnd.prag3: A complete rebuild of NND’s site featuring an engaging e-commerce experience, educational content, and a full admin area for seamless order management.

socotra.title: 2SOCOTRA TRAVEL
socotra.description: Full landing page development to present and market unique travel experiences to Socotra.
socotra.prag1: Planning a trip to Socotra can be overwhelming. With limited resources, scattered information, and unreliable bookings, travelers often struggle to plan their perfect adventure.
socotra.prag2: 2SOCOTRA TRAVEL is here to redefine the experience.
socotra.prag3: A complete landing page build designed to offer a seamless booking experience, stunning travel insights, and an intuitive admin panel for effortless trip management.

kasper.title: KASPER
kasper.description: Expertly crafted front-end template to beautifully display and elevate your creative projects with KASPER.
kasper.prag1: Creating a standout portfolio can be challenging. With endless design choices and the need to showcase your work effectively, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed.
kasper.prag3: A modern portfolio template offering sleek layouts, seamless navigation, and an intuitive interface to effortlessly highlight your projects and impress your audience.
